title: Colorado National Monument: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Address 1750 Rim Rock Drive Fruita, CO, 81521 Phone General Information: 970-858-3617 ext 360 Fax 970-858-0372 Staff Superintendent: 970-858-3617  ext 300 Chief of Interpretation: 970-858-3617 ext 363 Chief of Maintenance: 970-858-3617 ext 346 Chief Ranger: 970-858-3617 ext 312 Chief of Resource Management: 970-858-3617 ext 313 Administrative Office: 970-858-3617 ext 304 Educational Fee Waivers: 970-858-3617 ext 300 Special Use Permits: 8970-858-3617 ext 300
